name: user-info
description: please run  ``` npm install ``` then  ``` nodemon server.js ``` open postman with 'http://localhost:3000/insertUser', if you see 'User added to database with ID: 0', you succeed!  open postman with 'http://localhost:3000/', if you see such as ' [                                                                      {                                                                          "username": "tingbaobao",                                                                          "name": "tingbaobao",                                                                          "age": 22,                                                                          "sex": "?",                                                                          "telephone": "15829348754",                                                                          "email": "1766153116@qq.com",                                                                          "other": ""                                                                      },                                                                      {                                                                          "username": "tingbaobao",                                                                          "name": "tingbaobao",                                                                          "age": 22,                                                                          "sex": "nv",                                                                          "telephone": "15829348754",                                                                          "email": "1766153116@qq.com",                                                                          "other": ""                                                                      }                                                                  ] ', you succeed!
